en.pageDescription: Think you know your friends? Spill their secrets and make them sip their drinks!

rules.text: The current player (the 'Guesser') reads the question silently.
For everyone else, the Guesser secretly predicts: *Did they do it?*
The Guesser reads the question aloud.
If the Guesser correctly predicted a player *did it*, that player sips. If the Guesser made *any* incorrect prediction (for any player), the Guesser sips once!
Give the device to the next player (to the right).
The new Guesser taps for a new question, reads it silently, and their turn begins!
Keep going until you're out of questions or decide to stop. Have fun and drink responsibly!

tutorialSteps.title: Welcome to Sip 'n Spill!
tutorialSteps.description: This isn't your typical 'Never Have I Ever' game. You'll be guessing what your friends have done, not sharing your own experiences!

tutorialSteps.title: Step 1: The Guesser
tutorialSteps.description: One player becomes the 'Guesser' and reads a question silently to themselves first.

tutorialSteps.title: Step 2: Make Predictions
tutorialSteps.description: The Guesser then secretly predicts for each other player: 'Did they do this or not?' without revealing the question yet.

tutorialSteps.title: Step 3: The Reveal
tutorialSteps.description: After making all predictions, the Guesser reads the question out loud to everyone.

tutorialSteps.title: Step 4: Truth Time
tutorialSteps.description: Each player honestly answers whether they've done the thing in the question.

tutorialSteps.title: Step 5: Drinking Rules
tutorialSteps.description: If the Guesser was RIGHT about a player doing it - that player drinks! If the Guesser was WRONG about anyone - the Guesser drinks for each mistake!

tutorialSteps.title: Step 6: Pass & Repeat
tutorialSteps.description: Pass the phone to the next player who becomes the new Guesser, and repeat! The game gets funnier as you learn surprising things about your friends.
